entry.title: Graduation Fundraising Puzzle. Custom fundraising idea for college tuition.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 44.99 - 51.99 (14 variants)

It's graduation time and there's no better way to send your graduate off into their next chapter than with a custom puzzle.  Turn that graduation photo into a lasting memory that they can piece together daily. 

If you've ever needed a custom fundraising idea that is easy, fast, and very effective then this fundraiser is for you. Gather your graduation photo and turn it into your ticket to college! It's so easy to use a customized puzzle as an event-based fundraiser too - we'll guide the way on how you can make money FAST.

Check out our FUNDRAISER page filled with ideas on how to use a custom puzzle for a unique and fast fundraiser.

entry.title: Personalized Photo Puzzle. Turn your picture into a puzzle.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 46.99

 

Turn your photo into a custom jigsaw puzzle.  It's simple to do, is Made In America from high-quality materials, and will arrive at your doorstep FAST.  Gather your photo and let's get started!

Here's how to make your custom puzzle:

  1. Select a piece count.
  2. Upload your image.
  3. Select rush or no rush option.
  4. Go through checkout.
  5. It will arrive to your door FAST.

entry.title: Personalized Custom Photo Wedding Puzzle with 150 pieces 20x30 inches
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Wedding
Price: 79.99 - 94.99 (4 variants)

Do you love personalized puzzles?  Personalized Puzzles are a great way to relax and enjoy the company of friends and family. They’re also an amazing gift for any occasion!  Our Personalized Custom Photo Puzzle with 150 pieces is a Unique Wedding Guest Book Puzzle.  Featuring very vibrant colors on a thick board and printed in a professional matte finish, this puzzle is absolutely stunning.
Each piece in this Poster Size puzzle will measure approximately 2 x 2 inches, with a finished size of the puzzle at approximately 20 x 30 inches! For ease of assembly, we'll even hand-number the back of the puzzle for a nominal fee.

This personalized photo puzzle makes an excellent wedding guest book or anniversary gift that can be enjoyed by all ages from 6 to 106! It's perfect for those who want something different than traditional guest books and provides fun for your guests.  You can read the personalized messages on each piece before assembling it into one large picture - so every time you put it together you'll see your guest's special words of love and encouragement.  Better yet, why not frame it and hang it where all can see, as this elegant puzzle should fit into a standard size frame.

Ordering has never been easier – just upload your favorite Engagement Photo and click “Add To Cart”.  We offer many payment options including the option to split your payment into 4 easy interest-free payments with Zazzle.

entry.title: Engagement or Anniversary Puzzle - Heart Shape
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 24.99 - 29.99 (2 variants)

Every special moment in time with a jigsaw puzzle.

Gather your most cherished photo memory and turn it into a high-quality photo.  If you are newly engaged or celebrating an anniversary, this is the perfect gift.  Piece every moment of your relationship together on a date night and celebrate!

This personalized custom made puzzle makes an incredible Anniversary gift idea and a very romantic Engagement idea.

This beautiful Heart Shaped Puzzle will measure approximately 12 x 10 inches when it is complete and has 88 irregularly shaped pieces, making this a challenge. A wonderful Valentine's present, Engagement puzzle, or special way to show your love!

*There may be slight variations in the photo on the lid and the puzzle, as we hand-cut the image for the box.

entry.title: Heart Shaped Custom Puzzle for Date Night fun.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 29.99 - 34.99 (2 variants)

Our beautiful custom Heart-Shaped Puzzle with 80 irregularly shaped pieces,  and is so romantic.  This high-quality Heart Shaped Puzzle is so romantic and will bring smiles and fun times. 

Show your love how much they mean to you with this heart-shaped puzzle.   Great for marriage proposals!  Makes a wonderful puzzle for that special couple. The Heart Shape is so sweet and sentimental and makes for great date night fun!  This custom puzzle from your photo is an excellent Anniversary Present, Valentine's Day present, or Marriage Proposal. 

* Please be sure that your photo can be made into a heart shape.  It is recommended that the subjects in the photo are not covering the entire photo.  (We don't want to cut out anyone's head or feet!)  Landscape images work best.  *

There might be slight variations in the photo on the lid vs. the photo on the puzzle as we hand-cut the lid.

entry.title: Custom Photo Puzzle - Poster Size Puzzle With 200 Pieces FB
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 82.99 - 97.99 (4 variants)

Personalized picture puzzle from your photo.  Our beautiful 200 piece puzzle features puzzle piece that are large enough for signatures, even the long ones!  Each thick puzzle piece fits beautifully in your puzzle and is symbolic of completing your life's puzzle, one piece at a time. 

This puzzle is affordably priced and can cost less than one print from a photographer!  We take your high-resolution image and then make you into a puzzle, right here in AMERICA.

SIZE: 

  • 200 Piece Puzzle:  Each piece will measure approximately 2 x 1.5 inches when complete, with a finished size of the puzzle at approximately 20 x 30 inches, give or take.

BEST RESULTS: This is a Gigantic Poster Size Puzzle so please be sure to send us a high-resolution photo for best results. If purchasing a photo from your photographer, be sure to mention that you will be enlarging the photo to approximately 20 x 30 inches. We print what you send, so be sure to send a print-ready photo.

RECOMMENDATION: We recommend having your photo numbered if it is similarly colored or patterned, as our pieces are similarly shaped and sized, but not exact.

Unique personalized picture puzzle for Wedding Guest Book for large weddings.

Our Unique Wedding Guest Book Puzzle is absolutely stunning and features 200 large pieces for your guests to sign.   This puzzle is beautifully printed in a professional-grade matte finish and is cut on a very thick 100% recycled board.  Be Earth-conscious and trendy.

A fantastic buy, this Personalized Wedding Guest Book Puzzle encourages your guests to interact with each other while leaving you a lifetime memory. It also looks amazing framed!

Details: 

  • 200 Piece Puzzle:  Each piece will measure approximately 2 x 1.5 inches when complete, with a finished size of the puzzle at approximately 20 x 30 inches, give or take.
  • 150 Piece Puzzle:  Each piece will have an average size of 2 x 2 inches each and a nice surface area for a few words and signature  The finished size will be approximately 20 x 30 inches, give or take.   

BEST RESULTS: This is a Gigantic Poster Size Puzzle so please be sure to send us a high-resolution photo for best results. If purchasing a photo from your photographer, be sure to mention that you will be enlarging the photo to approximately 20 x 30 inches. 

HAND NUMBERING OPTION:   We can hand-number the back of your puzzle in pencil, which saves a ton of time and significantly helps with assembly.  We recommend having your photo numbered if it is similarly colored or patterned, as our pieces are similarly shaped and sized, but not exact.  

We recommend using a medium point pen on our regular backing, which is a light color.

entry.title: 200 Piece Custom Photo Jigsaw Wedding Guest Book Puzzle - Poster Size Puzzle
entry.summary:

Unique personalized picture puzzle for Wedding Guest Book for large weddings.

Our Unique Wedding Guest Book Puzzle is absolutely HUGE and features 200 large pieces for your guests to sign.   Gather your engagement photos and turn one into a custom photo puzzle guestbook.  Your guests will love the fun of interacting with your Guest Book Puzzle and will always be a piece of your big day.

A fantastic buy, this Personalized Wedding Guest Book Puzzle encourages your guests to interact with each other while leaving you a lifetime memory on a puzzle piece.  Never put your guestbook in the closet again, instead frame it and display it for everyone to see.

SIZE: Each piece will measure approximately 2 x 1.5 inches when complete, with a finished size of the puzzle at approximately 20 x 30 inches, making this an easy to frame standard-size puzzle! 

BEST RESULTS: This is a Poster Size Puzzle so please be sure to send us a high-resolution photo for best results. If purchasing a photo from your photographer, be sure to mention that you will be enlarging the photo to approximately 20 x 30 inches. We print what you send, so be sure to send a print-ready photo.

RECOMMENDATION: We recommend having your photo hand-numbered if it is similarly colored or patterned, as our pieces are similarly shaped and sized, but are not exact.  We can hand-number the back of your puzzle in pencil so that they can be easily erased after assembly.  

We recommend using a medium-point ballpoint pen to write on the back of the puzzle pieces.  Please be sure to have a few handy for your guests!
